::Obfucious::
      "Oooo.  I bet those come in handy."  He pulls on his weapon 
weakly grabing it with his other hand when it won't move.  He is 
quite startled when one half breaks off.  He looks at the new half 
quite confused.  "Well I suppose if they combine they should break 
apart as well."  He stares at it absentmindedly forgetting Clash.
